org.mozilla.gecko.permissions

Class PermissionBlock

  • Object
    • org.mozilla.gecko.permissions.PermissionBlock

  • public class PermissionBlock
extends Object
    Helper class to run code blocks depending on whether a user has granted or denied certain runtime permissions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PermissionBlock andFallback(Runnable onPermissionsDenied)
      Execute this fallback if at least one permission has not been granted.
      PermissionBlock doNotPrompt()
      Do not prompt the user to accept the permission if it has not been granted yet.
      PermissionBlock doNotPromptIf(boolean condition)
      If the condition is true then do not prompt the user to accept the permission if it has not been granted yet.
      PermissionBlock onBackgroundThread()
      Execute all callbacks on the background thread.
      PermissionBlock onUIThread()
      Execute all callbacks on the UI thread.
      void run()
      Execute this permission block.
      void run(Runnable onPermissionsGranted)
      Execute the specified runnable if the app has been granted all permissions.
      PermissionBlock withPermissions(String... permissions)
      Determine whether the app has been granted the specified permissions.

      • Methods inherited from class Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • withPermissions

        public PermissionBlock withPermissions(@NonNull
                                       String... permissions)
        Determine whether the app has been granted the specified permissions.

      • onUIThread

        public PermissionBlock onUIThread()
        Execute all callbacks on the UI thread.

      • onBackgroundThread

        public PermissionBlock onBackgroundThread()
        Execute all callbacks on the background thread.

      • doNotPrompt

        public PermissionBlock doNotPrompt()
        Do not prompt the user to accept the permission if it has not been granted yet. This also guarantees that the callback will run on the current thread if no callback thread has been explicitly specified.

      • doNotPromptIf

        public PermissionBlock doNotPromptIf(boolean condition)
        If the condition is true then do not prompt the user to accept the permission if it has not been granted yet.

      • run

        public void run()
        Execute this permission block. Calling this method will prompt the user if needed.

      • run

        public void run(Runnable onPermissionsGranted)
        Execute the specified runnable if the app has been granted all permissions. Calling this method will prompt the user if needed.

      • andFallback

        public PermissionBlock andFallback(@NonNull
                                   Runnable onPermissionsDenied)
        Execute this fallback if at least one permission has not been granted.
